data.name: 与我签订契约，成为救世勇者吧！
data.detailed_description:
author's remarks

How to combine the strategic depth of card games with the story of RPG Games? This game is the answer I have explored for several times.

official Q group of the game

one billion twenty-six million five hundred and seventy thousand and nine hundred

introduction to the game

You are a brave person who accepts the call of the goddess of time and crosses to the other world to save the world on the brink of doom.

battle

  • the element card mechanism can choose between instant cards and the powerful effect of delayed effects. In addition, it has more wonderful functions
  • weapon and shield system, together with the traditional card mechanism to build a card group

travel

  • npc event chain is no longer just a fragmented narrative, but also can express a long-term plot.

data.short_description: This is a roguelike card construction game with a unique mechanism. Respond to the call of the goddess of time, go through and become brave, use skills, summon elements, meet many NPCs, go through many obstacles, and save this strange world on the brink of doom.
